info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 25 at 8:28AM CDT until April 25 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL TOM GREEN AND EAST CENTRAL IRION COUNTIES... At 828 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tankersley, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported quarter size hail with this storm in Mertzon at 820 AM CDT IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Tom Green and east central Irion Counties, including the following locations... Us-67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
